summary.para: Provides an enhanced version of to add the key system intended to be used with content to an element.

param.name: pURL
param.para: The URL of the source element, or NULL.

param.name: pType
param.para: The MIME type of the source element, or NULL.

param.name: pMedia
param.para: A media-query string that specifies the intended media type, or NULL. If specified, the string should conform to the W3C Media Queries specification.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the key system for the given source element index.

param.name: pType
param.para: The MIME type of the source element.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Extends the interface to provide additional capabilities.
